vallibrary.datatype
Class ConsensusMatrix

java.lang.Object
  vallibrary.datatype.ConsensusMatrix

public class ConsensusMatrix
extends java.lang.Object

The Consensus_Matrix class provides an object for representing a cosensus value. An object of type Consensus_Matrix contain a Matrix with the following fields: 'nOfItems'that contain the number of item, that contain for each cell (i,j) value of consensus from i and j.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Raffaele Giancarlo, Filippo Utro, Davide Scaturro
